alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason; Menard (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:32AM CST until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Oakford affecting Menard, Cass and Mason Counties. Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .An ice jam is ongoing west of Oakford. Expect levels to remain elevated near and upstream of the ice jam until the ice jam breaks up. Rapid fluctuations of several feet remain possible both upstream and downstream of the jam. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Oakford. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 471.0 feet, Flooding begins to agricultural areas not protected by levees. At 476.3 feet, Water overtops the South Sangamon East Levee. At 476.9 feet, Water reaches the top of Mason, Menard Special, and Oakford levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 473.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CST Friday was 473.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 473.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 471.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Sangamon River Oakford 471.0 473.0 Fri 9 am CST 473.5 473.5 473.3 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
